entranceHall.name: entranceHall
entranceHall.description:
You are in the grand entrance hall of a large building.
How did you get here?

basement.name: basement
basement.description:
You have found the basement of the mansion.
It is darker down here.
You get the sense a secret is nearby, but you only see the stairs you came from.

exits.description: A trapdoor was hidden amongst the dust.

attic.name: attic
attic.description:
Something rustles in the rafters as you enter the attic. Creepy.
It's big and dark up here.

attic2.name: attic2
attic2.description:
There's definitely a bat in here somewhere.
This part of the attic is brighter, so maybe you're safe here.

exits.description: A small door rattles in the wind.
There is a dumbwaiter near the chimney.

balcony.name: balcony
balcony.description: There's a strange light here on the balcony.

aliens.name: aliens
aliens.description:
The aliens take you aboard their spaceship.
...
I guess you escaped.

kitchen.name: kitchen
kitchen.description: You've found the kitchen. You smell moldy food and some kind of animal.

dumbwaiter.name: dumbwaiter
dumbwaiter.description: You crawl into the dumbwaiter. What are you doing?

secretRoom.name: secretRoom
secretRoom.description:
You have found the secret room.
Who thought a green rug was a good idea?

exits.description: You see a trapdoor with a spider crawling on it.

crypt.name: crypt
crypt.description: You've found your way into a crypt. You smell dirt.

outside.name: outside
outside.description:
You step out into the night.
It smells like freedom.

hallway0.name: hallway0
hallway0.description: This is a very long hallway.

hallway1.name: hallway1
hallway1.description: This is a very long hallway.

hallway2.description: This is a very long hallway.
